languages.text: "Вы в старейшем питейном заведении Футфола, {mf|господин|госпожа}. "Адептус Амасекус" — единственный Адептус, который можно найти на Футфоле!" {n}Женщина хрипло смеется.{/n} "Меня зовут Октавиана. Я подаю напитки, поддерживаю разговор и, если так уж случается, утихомириваю перебравших".

traits.locale_text: "Вы в старейшем питейном заведении Футфола, {mf|господин|госпожа}. "Адептус Амасекус" — единственный Адептус, который можно найти на Футфоле!" {n}Женщина хрипло смеется{/n} "Меня зовут Октавиана. Я подаю напитки, поддерживаю разговор и, если так уж случается, утихомириваю перебравших. Особые товары Октавианы для вас также всегда в наличии".

languages.text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."
languages.original_text: "Вы в старейшем питейном заведении Футфола, {mf|господин|госпожа}. "Адептус Амасекус" — единственный Адептус, который можно найти на Футфоле!" {n}Женщина хрипло смеется.{/n} "Меня зовут Октавиана. Я подаю напитки, поддерживаю разговор и, если так уж случается, утихомириваю перебравших".

traits.locale_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones. Octaviana's special stock is also available to you anytime."

"You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones. Octaviana's special stock is also available to you anytime."

I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones. Octaviana's special stock is also available to you anytime."

I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones. Octaviana's special stock is also available to you anytime."

"You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

languages.text: “你现在的位置，是落脚港最古老的酒吧，{mf|先生|女士}。艾玛赛克烈酒修会是落脚港唯一的修会！”{n}她嘶哑地大笑起来。{/n}“我是奥克塔维娜，我负责提供饮料，倾听烦恼。如果需要的话，我还负责让那些吵闹的家伙安静下来。”
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: “你现在的位置，是落脚港最古老的酒吧，{mf|先生|女士}。艾玛赛克烈酒修会是落脚港唯一的修会！”{n}她嘶哑地大笑起来。{/n}“我是奥克塔维娜，我负责提供饮料，倾听烦恼。如果需要的话，我还负责让那些吵闹的家伙安静下来。”

languages.text: «Te encuentras en el tugurio más antiguo de Paso, {mf|señor|señora}. ¡Aquí solo se encuentra el Adeptus Amasecus!». {n}Se ríe con voz ronca.{/n} «Mi nombre es Octaviana, sirvo bebidas, escucho y, si es necesario, calmo a los más ruidosos».
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: «Te encuentras en el tugurio más antiguo de Paso, {mf|señor|señora}. ¡Aquí solo se encuentra el Adeptus Amasecus!». {n}Se ríe con voz ronca.{/n} «Mi nombre es Octaviana, sirvo bebidas, escucho y, si es necesario, calmo a los más ruidosos».

languages.text: 「フットフォールで一番古い酒場だよ、{mf|旦那|姐さん}。アデプトゥス・アマセックはフットフォール唯一のアデプトゥスさ！」{n}彼女はしゃがれ声で大笑いした。{/n}「あたしはオクタヴィアナ。飲み物を出したり人の悩みを聞いたり…必要とあらば、荒っぽい客をしつけることがあたしの仕事さ」
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールで一番古い酒場だよ、{mf|旦那|姐さん}。アデプトゥス・アマセックはフットフォール唯一のアデプトゥスさ！」{n}彼女はしゃがれ声で大笑いした。{/n}「あたしはオクタヴィアナ。飲み物を出したり人の悩みを聞いたり…必要とあらば、荒っぽい客をしつけることがあたしの仕事さ」

languages.text: "Ihr befindet Euch in der ältesten Kneipe auf Footfall, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Im Adeptus Amasecus gibt es den einzigen Amasec, den Ihr auf Footfall finden werdet!" {n}Sie lacht heiser.{/n} "Ich bin Octaviana. Ich serviere Drinks, kann zuhören und bringe bei Bedarf die Krawallmacher zum Schweigen."
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr befindet Euch in der ältesten Kneipe auf Footfall, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Im Adeptus Amasecus gibt es den einzigen Amasec, den Ihr auf Footfall finden werdet!" {n}Sie lacht heiser.{/n} "Ich bin Octaviana. Ich serviere Drinks, kann zuhören und bringe bei Bedarf die Krawallmacher zum Schweigen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes dans le plus vieux troquet de tout Castel, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Vous ne trouverez pas d'autre Adeptus que l'Adeptus Amasecus dans le coin ! » {n}Elle pousse un rire rauque.{/n} « Moi, c'est Octaviana. Je remplis les verres, je tends l'oreille, et quand il le faut, je calme les trouble-fêtes. »
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes dans le plus vieux troquet de tout Castel, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Vous ne trouverez pas d'autre Adeptus que l'Adeptus Amasecus dans le coin ! » {n}Elle pousse un rire rauque.{/n} « Moi, c'est Octaviana. Je remplis les verres, je tends l'oreille, et quand il le faut, je calme les trouble-fêtes. »

languages.text: "Binliman'ın en eski meyhanesine geldiniz {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Binliman'da Adeptus Amasekus dışında Adeptus yoktur!" {n}Boğuk bir sesle gülüyor.{/n} "Adım Octaviana. İçki servisi yapar, dert dinler, lüzum olduğunda da külhanbeyliğine kalkanları sustururum."
languages.original_text: "You're in the oldest watering hole on Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. The Adeptus Amasecus is the only Adeptus one can find on Footfall!" {n}She laughs hoarsely.{/n} "I'm Octaviana. I serve drinks, lend an ear, and, if it comes down to it, quiet the rowdy ones."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın en eski barına geldiniz {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Binliman'da Adeptus Amasekus dışında Adeptus yoktur!" {n}Boğuk bir sesle gülüyor.{/n} "Adım Octaviana. İçki servisi yaparım, dert dinlerim, gerekirse şamatacıları susturmasını da bilirim."
